title: Chairman, Dy Chairman Senate express grief over demise of Sanjrani’s father in law
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jul 17 (APP): Chairman Senate, Syed Yousuf Raza Gilani on Wednesday expressed grief and sorrow over the death of father-in-law of former Chairman Senate, Sadiq Sanjrani.
In his message, the chairman senate expressed sympathy with the bereaved family. He prayed to Allah Almighty to elevate the ranks of the departed soul in heaven and grant courage to the bereaved family members to bear this loss with equanimity.
Meanwhile, Deputy Chairman Senate, Saidal Khan also expressed his condolence over the death of the father in law of former Chairman Senate, Sadiq Sanjrani and prayed higher status for the departed soul in heaven.
